Title: Mad Dogs and Englishmen
Plot: Atticus throws a party. Faith provides the girls, The Dealer provides the recreation and Hank's old friend provides the entertainment. Hank gets a taste of his own medicine with Karen. Atticus tries to recreate rock and roll folklore with one of his biggest fans while Charlie reunites with The Widow.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
